rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space with minimalistic decor aligning to Vastu for a welcoming entry.

rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan area combining living space, dining table, and kitchenette, designed in minimalist style with functional furniture.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace integrated within the ground floor to maintain work-life balance; includes built-in shelving.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom design using minimal fixtures and water-saving solutions.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with minimalist aesthetics and proper orientation to ensure natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Closet/Laundry Area
rooms.description: Compact area for storage and laundry purposes, integrated into the master bedroom suite.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated multimedia room with soundproofing and ambient lighting, located to avoid disturbance in sleeping areas.
